[1;32mParameter docstrings: =====================[0m

[1;34mspecies: The phenotype/species-specific fitted DEB model to use.[0m [1;31massimilation_mode: The method used to calculate the DEB assimilation energy flow.[0m [1;34mstarvation_strategy: Whether starvation strategy is active[0m [1;31maging: Whether aging is active[0m [1;34mhunger_as_EEB: Whether the DEB-generated hunger drive informs the exploration-exploitation balance.[0m [1;31muse_gut: Whether to use the gut module.[0m [1;34mhunger_gain: The sensitivy of the hunger drive in deviations of the DEB reserve density.[0m [1;31mhours_as_larva: The age since eclosion[0m [1;34msteps_per_day: How many iterations of the model per day[0m [1;31msubstrate: The substrate where the agent feeds[0m
